mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LEVEL, ARTICLENO, PARENTNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(level-1)) || TITLE TITLE, CONTENT, USERID, WRITEDATE, VIEWCNT, ROWNUM RNO from SHOP_BOARD where ARTICLENO>=0 START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY ARTICLENO DESC ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP_BOARD(ARTICLENO, PARENTNO, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, VIEWCNT) VALUES( (SELECT MAX(ARTICLENO)+1 from SHOP_BOARD), 0, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{viewCnt})

INSERT INTO BOARD_IMAGE(NT_IMGNO, USERID, ARTICLENO, ORIGINALFILENAME, STOREDFILENAME, FILESIZE) VALUES(NT_IMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{USERID}, #{ARTICLENO}, #{ORIGINALFILENAME}, #{STOREDFILENAME}, #{FILESIZE})

INSERT INTO SHOP_BOARD(ARTICLENO, PARENTNO, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, VIEWCNT) VALUES( (SELECT MAX(ARTICLENO)+1 from SHOP_BOARD), #{articleNO}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{viewCnt})
